segments.text: I am amazed by how focused the woman is on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing in a puddle of water, but she doesn't even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children behind her, quietly taking cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks really unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of concern for his safety, hoping he doesn't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how the woman can be so oblivious to everything that's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, water spilling onto the floor, but she's just standing there, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the garden outside the window, so peaceful and well-maintained.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like the calm before the storm, with all the chaos happening inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman must be really exhausted, to not notice all this commotion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she takes a break soon, before any accidents happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
